title: IGF & Choice Awards
description: The IGF competition awards winners in eight categories during GDC. Join thousands of attendees to honor innovative and independently created video games from around the world with any GDC pass before the Game Developers Choice Awards.

title: Kick off 2025 with these game jams!
description: The new year brings a fresh wave of game jams! From tournament-style competitions to cozy winter creations. Here are some notable jams to check out this month.

title: 'Consume Me' Wins Grand Prize, Nuovo Award at the 2025 IGF Awards
description: Indie game Consume Me, developed by Jenny Jiao Hsia, AP Thomson, Jie En Lee, Violet W-P and Ken 'coda' Snyder, won the Seumas McNally Grand Prize and the Nuovo Award at the 2025 Independent Games Festival on Wednesday.

title: 'Moon Studios' Ori series tops 15m sales
description: 'Not too shabby for a Metroidvania and a genre we were told is dead,' says creator
